data.author: dezign999

changelog.release_notes: Adjusted the time offset animation for better sequencing on the Time(Rect) when animation ends. Smoothed out animation routine to fix a jumpy spot on frame 25 back to frame 1.

data.description:
C-3PO: Sir, the possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid field is approximately 3,720 to 1. 

Han Solo: Never tell me the odds. 

Fly through an astroid field in the Millennium Falcon! Flick to animate, or watch it animate automatically every minute!

Powered by Giphy

Star Wars, Star Wars: The Force Awakens, C-3PO, Han Solo and Millennium Falcon are property of Lucasfilm Ltd., Disney.

latest_release.release_notes: Adjusted the time offset animation for better sequencing on the Time(Rect) when animation ends. Smoothed out animation routine to fix a jumpy spot on frame 25 back to frame 1.

data.title: Falcon
